name: Oathbound Gauntlet
desc:
You throw a magically created gauntlet at a target creature that can see you, challenging it to a duel. It must make a Willpower saving throw. On a failure, both you and your target are locked into a duel with each other. Any attack or spell from either duelist that does not target or include either duelist automatically fails.

You must make a Willpower saving throw to end the effect early. Otherwise, the spell only ends when one creature is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points.
empower: You have resistance to all damage taken outside of the duel.
author: CrusaderDroid
